Do we back off as he said?\""},{"lineNumber":194878,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":194879,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、事情があるのか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, is there some kind of situation...?\""},{"lineNumber":194880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、なんと優しい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, how kind...\""},{"lineNumber":194881,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんと勇ましい者……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wh-what a brave person...\""},{"lineNumber":194882,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":194883,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロッキーの眼光が鋭くなる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rocky's gaze sharpens."},{"lineNumber":194884,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ならば、致し方なし」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, it can't be helped.\""},{"lineNumber":194885,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴殿達の安全の為にも、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For your safety,"},{"lineNumber":194886,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここは撃退させて頂く！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will have to drive you away here!\""},{"lineNumber":194887,"originalJapaneseLine":"「参る！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here I come!\""},{"lineNumber":194888,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひ、ひーっ！　強そうな奴が来たー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-hiya! A strong guy is coming!\""},{"lineNumber":194889,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、負けた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I've lost...\""},{"lineNumber":194890,"originalJapaneseLine":"力尽きたのか、ロッキーがその場に倒れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rocky collapses on the spot, seemingly exhausted."},{"lineNumber":194891,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほーっ、良かったぁ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew, that was close..."},{"lineNumber":194892,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝てたぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We won...\""},{"lineNumber":194893,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":194894,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、どうした、＜エール＞？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, what's wrong, <Yell>?\""},{"lineNumber":194895,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはそっと倒れたロッキーを窺う。","translatedEnglishLine":"You quietly observe the fallen Rocky."},{"lineNumber":194896,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":194897,"originalJapaneseLine":"と、あなたが動こうとすると――","translatedEnglishLine":"Just as you try to move—"},{"lineNumber":194898,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおおおおおおおおおおお！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uoooooohhhhhhh!!!\""},{"lineNumber":194899,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロッキーが突然立ち上がって叫びだした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rocky suddenly stands up and yells."},{"lineNumber":194900,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひーっ！？　なになになに！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hii!? What what what!?\""},{"lineNumber":194901,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おら、負けちまっただー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I've lost!"},{"lineNumber":194902,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスJr.様に申し訳ないだー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sorry to Lord Rance Jr.!\""},{"lineNumber":194903,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おら！　どうしたらいいだー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey! What should I do!?\""},{"lineNumber":194904,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ！　そ、そうだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha! Y-yes, that's it!\""},{"lineNumber":194905,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ももも、申し訳ありませんでしただー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I-I'm terribly sorry!\""},{"lineNumber":194906,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロッキーががばーっとあなたに土下座してきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rocky suddenly prostrates himself deeply before you."},{"lineNumber":194907,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おらが代わりに謝るから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll apologize on your behalf,"},{"lineNumber":194908,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスJr.様は許して欲しいだー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"please forgive Lord Rance Jr.!\""},{"lineNumber":194909,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、いやいや！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, no no!"},{"lineNumber":194910,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おらなんかの命で良ければ、","translatedEnglishLine":"If my life is enough,"},{"lineNumber":194911,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうぞ奪ってやって欲しいだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"please take it!\""},{"lineNumber":194912,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、なにとぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, I'm begging you!"},{"lineNumber":194913,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの方だけはー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please spare that person!\""},{"lineNumber":194914,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんなのこのおっさん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wh-what is with this old man..."},{"lineNumber":194915,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さっきまでとキャラも違うし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"His character is different from before...\""},{"lineNumber":194916,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……さっきまでのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... what you saw earlier,"},{"lineNumber":194917,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おらの田舎くさい喋りが気に入らないと、","translatedEnglishLine":"he forced me to not use my rustic way of speaking,"},{"lineNumber":194918,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスJr.様に強制されて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"on Lord Rance Jr.'s orders...\""},{"lineNumber":194919,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おら、本当はこっちが素なんだす……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is actually my real self...\""},{"lineNumber":194920,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……急に親しみやすくなった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Suddenly, he became more approachable.\""},{"lineNumber":194921,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ、そうだすか……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh, is that so...?\""},{"lineNumber":194922,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞、＜エール＞、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"<Yell>, <Yell>,"},{"lineNumber":194923,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんかこいつ変な奴だよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"this guy's kinda weird...\""},{"lineNumber":194924,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　どうしただすか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? What's wrong?\""},{"lineNumber":194925,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスJr.様は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance Jr. is..."},{"lineNumber":194926,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おらにとってとても大事な方の","translatedEnglishLine":"a very important person's"},{"lineNumber":194927,"originalJapaneseLine":"　落とし子だすから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"illegitimate child to me...\""},{"lineNumber":194928,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大事な方の子って……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The child of an important person..."},{"lineNumber":194929,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それ、もしかして……","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be that...?"},{"lineNumber":194930,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おらのことだすか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-You mean me!?\""},{"lineNumber":194931,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……どこから説明したものか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh... I wonder where I should begin explaining...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスJr.様には必ずや改心して頂く!
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We will definitely make Rance Jr. change his ways!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、ここは引いてはもらえぬか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, could you please back down here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までに比べると話は通じそうな奴だね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This guy seems more reasonable compared to before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうする？　言われた通り引く？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What should we do? Do we back off as he said?"
"Hmm, is there some kind of situation...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーの眼光が鋭くなる。
ここは撃退させて頂く！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will have to drive you away here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひ、ひーっ！　強そうな奴が来たー！」
力尽きたのか、ロッキーがその場に倒れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky collapses on the spot, seemingly exhausted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはそっと倒れたロッキーを窺う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You quietly observe the fallen Rocky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、あなたが動こうとすると――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as you try to move—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおおおおおおおおお！！！！」
ロッキーが突然立ち上がって叫びだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky suddenly stands up and yells.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスJr.様に申し訳ないだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sorry to Lord Rance Jr.!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おら！　どうしたらいいだー！？」
「ももも、申し訳ありませんでしただー！」
ロッキーががばーっとあなたに土下座してきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky suddenly prostrates himself deeply before you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスJr.様は許して欲しいだー！」
おらなんかの命で良ければ、
どうぞ奪ってやって欲しいだ！」
さっきまでとキャラも違うし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His character is different from before..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おらの田舎くさい喋りが気に入らないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he forced me to not use my rustic way of speaking,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスJr.様に強制されて……」
「おら、本当はこっちが素なんだす……」
なんかこいつ変な奴だよ……」
おらにとってとても大事な方の
「はあ……どこから説明したものか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sigh... I wonder where I should begin explaining..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスJr.様には必ずや改心して頂く!
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We will definitely make Rance Jr. change his ways!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、ここは引いてはもらえぬか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, could you please back down here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までに比べると話は通じそうな奴だね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This guy seems more reasonable compared to before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうする？　言われた通り引く？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What should we do? Do we back off as he said?"
"Hmm, is there some kind of situation...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキーの眼光が鋭くなる。
ここは撃退させて頂く！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will have to drive you away here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひ、ひーっ！　強そうな奴が来たー！」
力尽きたのか、ロッキーがその場に倒れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky collapses on the spot, seemingly exhausted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはそっと倒れたロッキーを窺う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You quietly observe the fallen Rocky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、あなたが動こうとすると――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as you try to move—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおおおおおおおおお！！！！」
ロッキーが突然立ち上がって叫びだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky suddenly stands up and yells.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスJr.様に申し訳ないだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sorry to Lord Rance Jr.!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おら！　どうしたらいいだー！？」
「ももも、申し訳ありませんでしただー！」
ロッキーががばーっとあなたに土下座してきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky suddenly prostrates himself deeply before you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスJr.様は許して欲しいだー！」
おらなんかの命で良ければ、
どうぞ奪ってやって欲しいだ！」
さっきまでとキャラも違うし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His character is different from before..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おらの田舎くさい喋りが気に入らないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he forced me to not use my rustic way of speaking,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスJr.様に強制されて……」
「おら、本当はこっちが素なんだす……」
なんかこいつ変な奴だよ……」
おらにとってとても大事な方の
「はあ……どこから説明したものか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sigh... I wonder where I should begin explaining..."
